page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I wake up at 7.30 and have a wash.I get dressed and go downstairs for breakfast which is usually fruit or weetabix with toast or sandwiches. Then mum plaits my hair, I clean my teeth and get out my rabbit, Sandy, later mum gets Annie, the guinea pig, out into the pen.I arrive at school at 8.45 am.At 9 am we have Assembly afterwards I do some maths or language work. At 10.30am its time for break. When I come back in I do some work until dinner time, I have a packed lunch. Then we play until 12.45pm. We may have a singing lesson next then we do more work until 2.00pm when its break for 15 minutes, then sometimes Games. School ends at 3.15pm. I go home and get a drink and something to eatand watch T.V. Later I have tea and feed Danny, our dog. After tea I sometimes go (continued)
